urls.title: Wholesale Fishing Flies Ltd, Suppliers of All Types of Fishing Flies
urls.description: Welcome to Wholesale Fishing Flies Ltd, one of Kenyas BEST online site for hand tied Fishing Flies of all kinds. We currently offer over 3000 fly patterns, many hardworking and competitive fishermen rely exclusively on us for innovation and quality fishing flies.We do custom order work which are tied to clients quality and specifications. We are always out inventing and introducing new patterns to our clients who end up being satisfied. Our customers are based in Kenya,the USA, UK, South Africa,Ireland,
